author: Home Repair Tutor
description: Toilet bowl installation tips…I always check the tile floor. If it’s not level that means the bowl has to be shimmed. I like centering the wax ring on the closet flange. Then I add tissues to the floor, if I flush the toilet and those tissues don’t absorb water that indicates there are no leaks 🔥#plumbing #toilets #bathroomremodel #homerenovation #diy #homerepairtutor
title: Toilet Bowl Installation Tips - #shorts #homerepairtutor #plumbing
